extendedInfo.description: !!ALPHA!!Accelerometer data is combined with GPS data to identify possible potholes. This APP can be very battery intensive,  plugging the phone into a car charger is advised.  The user interface is not designed to be used while operating a car!

reviews.title: Great concept
reviews.comment: Combine with publicity effort and hopefully NYC can be less of a third world back country dirt road. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Getting there
reviews.comment: I like where this is going, but I have trouble viewing the bumps on the map.  I would like it to be more sensitive and be able to see more bumpy spots.  Why not plot dots down the road with bigger bumps with bigger dots.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Still buggy (hence the alpha release)
reviews.comment: On my Samsung Epic 4g (Galaxy S SPH-D700), the program no longer uploads files. It\'ll say \"Transmitting track\", but it never actually posts the track to the CitizApps website. The developers have not responded to an email I sent them a week ago.
reviews.author: A Google User
